calculators.title: Compound Interest Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free compound interest calculator. Enter your principal, interest rate, and time period to see how your money grows with compounding.

calculators.title: Mortgage Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free mortgage calculator. Calculate your monthly payment, total interest, and total cost for any home loan amount, rate, and term.

calculators.title: Loan Repayment Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free loan repayment calculator. See your monthly payment, total interest paid, and full amortization schedule for any loan.

calculators.title: Retirement Savings Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free retirement savings calculator. See how much you need to save monthly to reach your retirement goal based on your age and expected returns.

calculators.title: Investment Return Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free investment return calculator. Calculate your portfolio growth with initial investment, monthly contributions, and expected annual returns.

calculators.title: Credit Card Payoff Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free credit card payoff calculator. See how long it takes to pay off your balance and how much interest you'll pay at your current monthly payment.

calculators.title: Emergency Fund Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free emergency fund calculator. Find out how much you need in your emergency fund based on your monthly expenses and personal risk factors.

calculators.title: Net Worth Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free net worth calculator. Add up your assets and liabilities to calculate your total net worth and track your financial progress.

calculators.title: Dollar Cost Averaging Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free dollar cost averaging calculator. See how regular investing over time can reduce risk and build wealth compared to lump-sum investing.

calculators.title: APR/APY Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free APR and APY calculator. Convert between annual percentage rate and annual percentage yield, and understand the true cost of borrowing.

calculators.title: Inflation Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free inflation calculator. See how inflation erodes purchasing power over time and what today's dollars will be worth in the future.

calculators.title: Capital Gains Tax Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free capital gains tax calculator. Calculate your tax liability on investment profits based on purchase price, sale price, and holding period.

calculators.title: VAT Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free VAT calculator. Quickly add or remove VAT at any rate. Works for UK VAT (20%), EU VAT, and any custom tax rate.

calculators.title: Percentage Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free percentage calculator with three modes: find percentage of a number, calculate percentage change, and find what percent X is of Y.

calculators.title: Statistics Calculator (Mean, Median, Mode)
calculators.meta_description: Free statistics calculator. Enter any data set to instantly calculate mean, median, mode, range, and count.

calculators.title: Standard Deviation Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free standard deviation calculator. Calculate population and sample standard deviation, variance, and mean for any data set.

calculators.title: Pythagorean Theorem Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free Pythagorean theorem calculator. Find any missing side of a right triangle using a¬≤ + b¬≤ = c¬≤.

calculators.title: Circle Area Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free circle calculator. Calculate the area, circumference, and diameter of any circle from its radius.

calculators.title: Volume Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free volume calculator for common 3D shapes. Calculate the volume of cubes, spheres, cylinders, cones, and rectangular prisms.

calculators.title: Probability Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free probability calculator. Calculate the probability of an event, odds in favor, and odds against from favorable and total outcomes.

calculators.title: Profit Margin Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free profit margin calculator. Calculate gross profit margin, net margin, and markup from cost and revenue figures.

calculators.title: Break-Even Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free break-even calculator. Find out how many units you need to sell to cover your fixed and variable costs.

calculators.title: ROI Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free ROI calculator. Calculate return on investment as a percentage from your investment cost and gain.

calculators.title: Markup Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free markup calculator. Calculate selling price from cost and markup percentage, or find the markup from cost and selling price.

calculators.title: BMI Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free BMI calculator. Calculate your Body Mass Index from height and weight with instant category classification.

calculators.title: Calorie Calculator
calculators.meta_description: Free daily calorie calculator. Estimate how many calories you need per day based on age, weight, height, and activity level.

calculators.title: Unit Converter
calculators.meta_description: Free unit converter. Convert between common units of length, weight, volume, and more with instant results.

calculators.title: Currency Converter
calculators.meta_description: Educational currency converter with reference exchange rates. Convert between major world currencies for estimation purposes.

calculators.title: Temperature Converter
calculators.meta_description: Free temperature converter. Convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin instantly with the formulas shown.

country_calculators.meta_description_pattern: Free {Country} income tax calculator. Estimate your tax liability based on {country_adj} tax brackets for the current year.
Free {Country} salary after tax calculator. Enter your gross salary to see your estimated take-home pay after income tax and deductions.
Free {Country} capital gains tax calculator. Estimate your tax on investment profits based on {country_adj} capital gains tax rates.
Free {Country} self-employment tax calculator. Estimate your self-employment tax liability including social contributions.
Free {Country} VAT/sales tax calculator. Add or remove tax at the current {country_adj} rate.
